Titanium

Titanium

Name: Titanium

Formula: Ti

Atomic Number: 22

Group: 4

Block: d

Period: 4

Relative Atomic Mass: 47.867

Discovery Date: 1791

Appearance: A hard, shiny and strong metal.

Uses: Jewellery, alloys used in aircraft and spacecraft, surgical applications, golf clubs, laptops, submarines.

Atomic Structure:
